channel.title: AnbuOnline
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]AnbuOnline[/size][/b][/center]
[b][i]Introduction[/i][/b] A project like none other before I've decided to create a unique Runescape Server. To combine both Anime and a classical legendary games, I bring before everyone AO. AnbuOnline will be a Naruto/Runescape server filled with both parts that everyone loves. Using a classical Runescape [PI] source and combining with Naruto filled features. Please note this has never been done and attempting to this Project is extremely hard.
[i][b]Features[/b][/i]
[ul][li]7 Legendary Swords[/li] [li]Kunai[/li] [li]Konohagakure[/li] [li]Sunagakure[/li] [li]Roleplay Tokens[/li] [li]RolePlay[/li] [li]Custom Spells[/li] [li]Jutu's[/li] [li]Custom Ranks[/li] [li]Kage Positions[/li] [li]Chuunin Exams[/li] [li]Missing-Ninja[/li] [li]Akatsuki Robes[/li] [li]Jichuuriki[/li][/ul]
and much more!
[i][b]Application[/b][/i] With a project like this requires more available help. As our staff proceed working restless hours to provide such a unique game it's just not enough. Several positions are currently open if you wish to help in a project such as this. I ask you have both Naruto experience and Runescape. You must have time and dedicated hours and reasonable social skills.
Please Follow The Template:
Name: Age: Experience: Skype: Type Of Position: [Web dev/Content Dev/Monster dev/Item dev/Object dev]
If you have no interest in the team and just would like to follow us our site is located at http://anbuonline.createaforum.com/
Pictures: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/eurgnp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1zwtvm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/14jm16s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/15y6nh4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/245diwy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/289v910.jpg[/img]

item.title: AnbuOnline
item.dc:creator: @daeree daeree
item.description:
@daeree wrote:

[center][size=24pt]AnbuOnline[/size][/center]

Introduction
A project like none other before I’ve decided to create a unique Runescape Server. To combine both Anime and a classical legendary games, I bring before everyone AO. AnbuOnline will be a Naruto/Runescape server filled with both parts that everyone loves. Using a classical Runescape [PI] source and combining with Naruto filled features. Please note this has never been done and attempting to this Project is extremely hard.

Features

[ul][li]7 Legendary Swords[/li]
[li]Kunai[/li]
[li]Konohagakure[/li]
[li]Sunagakure[/li]
[li]Roleplay Tokens[/li]
[li]RolePlay[/li]
[li]Custom Spells[/li]
[li]Jutu’s[/li]
[li]Custom Ranks[/li]
[li]Kage Positions[/li]
[li]Chuunin Exams[/li]
[li]Missing-Ninja[/li]
[li]Akatsuki Robes[/li]
[li]Jichuuriki[/li][/ul]

and much more!

Application
With a project like this requires more available help. As our staff proceed working restless hours to provide such a unique game it’s just not enough. Several positions are currently open if you wish to help in a project such as this. I ask you have both Naruto experience and Runescape. You must have time and dedicated hours and reasonable social skills.

Please Follow The Template:

Name:
Age:
Experience:
Skype:
Type Of Position: [Web dev/Content Dev/Monster dev/Item dev/Object dev]

If you have no interest in the team and just would like to follow us our site is located at http://anbuonline.createaforum.com/
